text: Assalamu 'alayki yaa ummal 'Abbas ibn Ameeril Mu'mineen 'alayhis salam,
Assalamu 'alayki wa 'ala awladiki al-arba'atu al-mustashhadeena bayna yaday al-imam al-Hussain 'alayhis salam yawma 'Ashura,
Ridwaanu Allah ta'ala 'alayk, wa ja'ala Allah a'laal jannah manzalik wa ma'wak,
Yaa wajiha 'ind Allah, ishfa'ee lana 'ind Allah,
Wa sallallahu 'ala Muhammad wa aalihi al-tayyibeen al-tahireen.
title: Lady Ummul Baneen (sa) - 2
